Hide And Seek (2005)

Genre: Drama / Horror / Mystery / Thriller
Year: 2005
Country: USA
Runtime: 100 mins
Director: John Polson
Cast: Robert De Niro, Dakota Fanning, Famke Janssen, Elisabeth Shue, Amy Irving, Dylan Baker, Melissa Leo, Robert John Burke, Molly Grant Kallins, David Chandler, Stewart Summers, Jake Dylan Baumer
Plot: 
After his wife commits suicide, David Callway and his daughter, Emily, move upstate to find peace and "restart" their lives. But when mysterious and dangerous things start happening, and Emily makes a new friend named Charlie, David and Emily&#039;s doctor, Katherine, begin to worry. Now, David and Emily must find a way out of this mess...if they are to survive.
